its a fun game

Идеальная игра, созданная Valve, она действительно получилось очень хорошей.
Нет скинов? ну скачай и поставь их, тебе за это не дадут Vac Ban.
А стрельба  отличная, за все части в CS выделилась, и понравилась, именно эта.
На серверах всегда есть админы, можно конечно встретить неадекватных людей, но тем неменее адекватных гораздо больше. Больше удовольствие приходить с гулянки/работы, и идти играть на сервер, где с тобой поздароваются, а не скажут "пошёл нах*й"
Однозначно рекомендую
Денег своих стоит.
this game is really fun to play before and looking at the time I played is a childhood memories
The good counter strike as exciting as ever 7u7

I got the game for the content to be mounted to Garry's Mod like everyone who owns that game, I tried it out and it got addictive, you can play for hours in maps (Such as cs_piranesi, cs_havana, cs_compound, those maps) that were unfortunately were discontinued and not added/remastered in Counter-Strike: Global Offensive however they are downloadable on the Steam Workshop for CS:GO but aren't remastered.

If you're a kid reading the review and you're about to use your pocket money on "GMod Content" it is definitely worth it, not for the content, but for the game, try it, you will get addicted.

If you're a parent reading this review, the violence in the game is exactly the same violence as GMod and Half-Life 2, this game runs on the same Source Engine as those games so if you're alright with your child playing FPS Shooters like HL then it'll be alright.

I'm going to rate the game a 9.4/10 for being addictive, simple and has interesting maps.
C'est dans le sang ce jeu

The ultimate co-op game of all times. Me, my brothers and friends enjoy playing CS: Source so much. It's so addictive, marvelous and stress releasing. I love playing with both teams, but more often with CT force, cuz I like being the good guy fighting against terrorism.

I'm biased towards old(ish)/obsolete games and stuff like that. CS:S is a pretty fun game, even if you just get it for those stupid CS:S resource requirements for Garry's Mod maps.

Also fuck you if you require CS:S resources for Garry's Mod maps.
